items.content_html: Express REST API for CRUD operations on a JavaScript array. This simple and lightweight project serves as a foundation for building RESTful APIs with Express, focusing on basic Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on an in-memory JavaScript array. Ideal for learning and quick prototyping.
items.title: AbdulGaniShaikh/basic-express-apis: Express REST API for CRUD operations on a JavaScript array. This simple and lightweight project serves as a foundation for building RESTful APIs with Express, focusing on basic Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on an in-memory JavaScript array. Ideal for learning and quick prototyping.
